description.short: Retrieve and manage adhocCalls transcripts and recordings in Microsoft Teams.
description.full: This sample application for Microsoft Teams demonstrates how to use Microsoft Graph to retrieve and manage transcripts and recordings for adhocCalls, such as PSTN and other ad-hoc calls that are not part of an online meeting instance. It provides a consistent approach similar to meeting-based APIs, helping teams archive important call details for compliance, analytics, and post-call review.
